episodes.title: Kevin Smith: Cult Pastor — Dead or Alive? The Story that Shook Jamaica. Pt 2
episodes.description:
Kevin Smith had proclaimed himself a king and a prophet, and later convinced his followers at Pathways International Kingdom Restoration Ministries that he was “God in the flesh”.

But the path Smith walked led to ruin and disrepute, toward a destiny of destruction that haunts him even after death.

Posthumously charged with multiple crimes including murder, conspiracy to commit murder, and firearm offences, Smith cemented his place in history as one of Jamaica’s most notorious cult leaders.

Through more eyewitness accounts and disturbing details, the Jamaica Observer continues its chilling exploration of faith, manipulation and institutional failure, and confronts the haunting question: Did Kevin Smith really die?

episodes.title: Kevin Smith: Cult Pastor — Dead or Alive? The Story that Shook Jamaica. Pt 1
episodes.description:
What began as the ministry of a charismatic young pastor ended in one of Jamaica’s most shocking tragedies.

Kevin Smith, the self-proclaimed “prophet” and leader of the Pathways International Kingdom Restoration Ministries, had promised salvation through his “ark”, but his congregation found death and disrepute.

Through eyewitness accounts and haunting details, the Jamaica Observer explores Smith’s rise, his quick descent, and the devastating aftermath that forced Jamaica’s faith community to confront the darkness that can hide behind a pulpit.
